p: Multiple sequence alignment (MSA) of all nucleotide sequences were carried out in the EMBL-EBI Clustal Omega server to investigate sequence conservation [ 23, 24]. The Newick format for the multiple align sequence was used to generate phylogeny [ 25]. The phylogenetic tree was constructed in the Interactive Tree of Life (iTOL) online tool [ 26]. The iTOL server generate phylogeny trees in a circular (radial) and normal standard trees. The circular trees can be rooted and displayed in different arc sizes [ 27â€“ 29].
